verses.name: Ezekiel 34:10
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I am against the shepherds; and I will require my flock at their hand, and cause them to cease from feeding the flock; neither shall the shepherds feed themselves any more; for I will deliver my flock from their mouth, that they may not be meat for them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:11
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I, even I, will both search my sheep, and seek them out.
